Title: Silence of the Lambs
Description: A young FBI cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer.

Title: The Fabelmans
Description: Growing up in post-World War II era Arizona, young Sammy Fabelman aspires to become a filmmaker as he reaches adolescence, but soon discovers a shattering family secret and explores how the power of films can help him see the truth.

Title: Schindler's List
Description: Schindler's List is a 1993 American epic historical drama film directed and produced by Steven Spielberg and written by Steven Zaillian.

Title: Little Women
Description: Jo March reflects back and forth on her life, telling the beloved story of the March sisters - four young women, each determined to live life on her own terms.

Title: Lady Bird
Description: In 2017, an artistically inclined 17-year-old girl comes of age in Sacramento, California.

Title: Phantom Thread
Description: Set in 1950s London, Reynolds Woodcock is a renowned dressmaker whose fastidious life is disrupted by a young, strong-willed woman, Alma, who becomes his muse and lover.

Title: Happy as Lazzaro
Description: An unceasingly kind Italian peasant and his family are blatantly exploited by a tobacco baroness.

Title: Jojo Rabbit
Description: A young German boy in the Hitler Youth whose hero and imaginary friend is the country's dictator is shocked to discover that his mother is hiding a Jewish girl in their home.

Title: Ikiru
Description: A bureaucrat tries to find meaning in his life after he discovers he has terminal cancer.

Title: Isle of Dogs
Description: Set in Japan, Isle of Dogs follows a boy's odyssey in search of his lost dog.
